content.text: Hello! I'm a huge Beatles fan, too! What's your favorite song?
Hey there! I love so many of their songs, but I think my favorite is "I Want to Hold Your Hand." What about you?
I love that song too! It's so catchy. I also love "All You Need is Love."
Yes, that's another one of my favorites! They have so many great songs.
I know, right? They're one of my favorite bands of all time.
Me too! I'm glad to meet another Beatles fan.
Me too! What do you like most about them?
I love their music, of course, but I also love their message of peace and love.
Yes, that's one of the things I love about them too. They were such positive role models.
Me too. They're an inspiration to me.
Me too. I'm glad they're still so popular today.
I agree! What's your favorite Beatles album?
I think my favorite is "The White Album." What about you?
I love that album too! It's so hard to choose a favorite, though.
I know, right? They have so many great albums.
I think we're going to have to agree to disagree.
